h3.div: As per Governor Abbott's executive order, Anahuac ISD will be extending the suspension of normal district operations through the end of the 2019-2020 school year. We will continue to provide grab and go meals, as well as online learning and instructional packet pick-up throughout the closure. Please visit our website to access more information about distance learning resources and for any additional updates. Thank you for partnering with Anahuac ISD as we work to support student learning.

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: Due to the increase in participation of AISD’s grab and go meal service, our feeding times will change to 10:00 am until 12:00 pm, starting Monday, April 6. This adjustment will allow our staff more preparation time to meet the needs of our community. Thank you and stay safe!
